QuestData.Title: Bringing the Big Guns
QuestData.Description: Light's Judgment has a security feature to prevent it from falling into enemy hands. We can trigger its recall mechanism, which will teleport it back to a vessel.$b$bWith the Xenedar out of commission, the gun should recall to your ship instead. You can make good use of its firepower.$b$bThe process takes time, though, and will likely attract the Legion's attention. Be on your guard.
QuestData.RewardText: <The panel is now pulsing a soft golden glow. According to Romuul, activating it should teleport the cannon to the Vindicaar.>
